attributes.review:
You can really feel the white supremacy as SOON as the app opens. I thought this was a game.. at first where you get make a Cheeto clown loose weight but then I quickly found out they were SERIOUS!!
I went on to delete the app bc I felt unsafe and I called my mom to pick me up :( therefore I will be rating it a solid one star but I really wish I could give it less 🥰💕🌟🧚🏼🌻
attributes.title: GET THIS APP REMOVED

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app thinking I was gonna see my president ✨ O B A M A ✨ instead I see an ugly crusty orange Cheeto 🍊👺. Me and my brother got really scared 🙀😭😭. My brother had to get surgery for his eyes 👁👄👁. Every night I always have a nightmare 😿thanks to this app . I DO NOT recommend getting this app if don’t wanna have nightmares and get blind. Okay thanks for your time for reading this 😻😽😸. Sending luv 💝💘💞💞😽 except to the racist Cheeto puff 👺😾🍊.
attributes.title: 😿 N I G H T M A R E ✨

attributes.review: this app is so offensive mostly because trump is racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic and many other things. he once said “is it weird to be more sexually attracted to your daughter than to your own wife” that is absolute disgusting. not to mention Ivanka was only 13 at the time🤮. he is a horrible president and has done no good for america. i am disgusted to even see this in the app store.🙄
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: When I opened the app, it asked for my phone number. Naturally, I gave it. I was immediately sent a nude image of the president. I am now scarred for life and horrified. If the president is reading this, I would just like to let you know that if you’re so concerned about TikTok, make a secret account because we will ALL get a vpn and overlook your horrible judgement either way. Also, free Barron please.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: First off, I could barely open the app because of the HORRIBLE right-wing propaganda and pop up ads. These ads were advocating human rights violations, racism, sexism, homophobia, AND transphobia. I later found out that it’s mercy for the app! Who would let people sell this stuff. This app is disgusting and needs to be deleted along with D. T.
attributes.title: If I could give zero stars I would!!!! Delete this app!!!

attributes.review: i woke up to this app on my phone!! i tried to delete it but this bunker boy kept waving at me. i closed my eyes and prayed to my cheeto man that this wasnt real and woke up inside a room and saw him and his 🍤 I screamed CUT THE CAMERAS DEADASS and then i was in chuck.e.cheeses TURNS OUT TRUMPY IS FREDDY AND HE’S RAPING ALL THE MISSING KIDS- ew how disgusting. who supports this man. then he kissed 💋 his bleach blonde waitress 👩 and i saw through his disguise🧑🏼‍🏭oh i had it up to here🙋🏽‍♀️with these🙇🏽texas guys👨🏻‍🌾i hate it here.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: images shown when i opened this app gave me nightmares for weeks! i saw the most gruesome images and immediately ran to the toilet to throw up. there’s no warning giving for the scarring pictures shown and i don’t want anyone else to go through the same symptoms that i did. who ever runs the app store needs to take this app down immediately!!! 🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: diSkuSTANG

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay up to date with the election and when I opened it up it started glitching a bunch. Then they started hacking into my phone and selling my information to Russian companies. It was EXTREMELY scary. I had to move and change my name. Then trump slid into my dms and said scary things. I am a minor and he said very sexual things. DO NOT GET THIS APP UNLESS TO GIVE A BAD REVIEW! Thanks 🥰✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️✨worst app ever 🙄✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.review:
I was horrified to open the app and see OUR CURRENT PRESIDENT doing The Renegade! This is disgraceful to our country and should be  banned!!!  The Dance move itself is racist, with all the arm flapping! I will never look at the man the same way again! 
I also noticed the app was advertised Kim Jong-Un running for president of the United States! I can’t believe what is happening to our once, great nation.
attributes.title: I can’t believe it!!
